snippet: With Juman Malouf’s romantic Mitteleuropean sensibility, the Lebanon-born designer and costumer starts a new chapter as an author and illustrator.
abstract: Lebanese-born designer-turned-author Juman Malouf, author of The Trilogy of Two, gives tour of her antique-filled Paris apartment that she shares with her partner, filmmaker Wes Anderson.
lead_paragraph: With Juman Malouf’s romantic Mitteleuropean sensibility, the Lebanon-born designer and costumer starts a new chapter as an author and illustrator.

headline.main: The Fabulously Quirky World of Wes Anderson’s Partner
